name: Claude Product Management
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's product management knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's product management knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-product-management (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: competitive-analysis, feature-spec, metrics-tracking, roadmap-management, stakeholder-comms, user-research-synthesis. Rules: competitive-brief.md, metrics-review.md, roadmap-update.md, stakeholder-update.md, synthesize-research.md, write-spec.md.
